nodes.text: Product Relations was a subdivision of the Corporate Sector Authority's Media Division. It was responsible for molding and controlling the feelings of the Corporate Sector's residents, as well as marketing the Authority to outside interests. Public Relations dealt with the public service campaigns run throughout the Sector for the benefit of the residents, as well as advertising campaigns for Authority products in the larger galaxy. Public Relations also dealt with disgruntled ex-employees who publicly berated and badmouthed the Authority.
